Name: Deadly Charge
Desc: [Soul Light Skill] Ferociously charge at foes by summoning the Light Knight who can use the power of Light.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 300. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 825% damage 10 times, and creates an Abnormal Status debuff that increases damage +10% for you and your party for 60 seconds.
Applies 50% Blind Chance for 10 sec. and decreases Accuracy -30%.
Cooldown: 15 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 300. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 825% Damage 10 times.
Attacked enemies receive an Abnormal Status debuff that increases Damage TAKEN from you and your party by 10% for 60 sec.
Attacks create a 50% chance of Blind, which lasts for 10 sec., decreasing the target's Accuracy -30%.
Cooldown: 15 sec.
